relation.text: three weeks into the Country , where , little as I rake & sit
two years & is but 15 -- is still shorter but pretty tho ' with a very high forehead , she is reckoned
excell her infinitly -- we had a great Ball at the French Ambaſsadors on Thursday
was interrupted in my letter , & it is now
yours CMG -- To Mrs Dickenson Taxal Chapel le Frith Derbyshire Honble Miſs Gunning June 1787
